医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国有 100 万成年电子烟用户从未经常吸烟研究人员估计了英国不经常吸烟的成年人吸电子烟的趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/1-million-adult-vapers-in-England-have-never-regularly-smoked.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/1-million-adult-vapers-in-England-have-never-regularly-smoked.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c8c915e-2fac-4682-9596-1187b0627df0 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 10:14:00 -0400 1 million adult vapers in England have never regularly smoked
研究：满足身体活动指南的经济收益满足身体活动建议可以带来显着的经济效益。这些好处可以表现为个人工资收入和社会医疗保健成本的降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-Economic-gains-from-meeting-physical-activity-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-Economic-gains-from-meeting-physical-activity-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7150bbc3-3da9-4684-9990-5a563be48b59 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 10:02:16 -0400 Study: Economic gains from meeting physical activity guidelines
超加工食品对某些群体的负面影响明显研究人员评估了生活方式因素如何影响健康相关的生活质量与超加工食品消费之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Negative-impacts-of-ultra-processed-foods-pronounced-in-certain-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Negative-impacts-of-ultra-processed-foods-pronounced-in-certain-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=740818aa-a88a-4335-ab4b-8fc8390fd9b9 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 09:36:00 -0400 Negative impacts of ultra-processed foods pronounced in certain groups
Monmouth Scientific 将在实验室创新展上展示可持续清洁空气解决方案。加入 Monmouth Scientific 实验室创新中心，探索先进的清洁空气解决方案并了解改变实验室实践的可持续技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Monmouth-Scientific-to-showcase-Sustainable-Clean-Air-Solutions-at-Lab-Innovations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Monmouth-Scientific-to-showcase-Sustainable-Clean-Air-Solutions-at-Lab-Innovations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61dc2e8f-33b5-48a3-9efe-bcd4bb35c79a Tue, 08 Oct 2024 09:36:00 -0400 Monmouth Scientific to showcase Sustainable Clean Air Solutions at Lab Innovations.
人工甜味剂摄入量与不良妊娠结局之间的关系研究人员确定了人工甜味剂与妊娠结局之间的因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Relationship- Between-intake-of-artificial-sweeteners-and-adverse-pregnancy-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Relationship- Between-intake-of-artificial-sweeteners-and-adverse-pregnancy-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66f3b44d-a0d4-4211-a45d-dba2062dd230 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 09:15:00 -0400 Relationship between intake of artificial sweeteners and adverse pregnancy outcomes
COVID-19 大流行期间新加坡家庭适应的新见解新加坡国立大学杨潞龄医学院 (NUS Medicine) 进行的一项新研究分析了新加坡家庭在 COVID-19 大流行期间的恢复能力，发现了重要的发现，突显了大多数有幼儿的家庭如何成功地适应了新冠肺炎疫情带来的挑战。全球危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/New-insights-into-family-adaptation-in-Singapore-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/New-insights-into-family-adaptation-in-Singapore-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b3b7711-1717-4701-b58c-88f5a56c4c2d Tue, 08 Oct 2024 07:05:15 -0400 New insights into family adaptation in Singapore during the COVID-19 pandemic
利用 SmartCADD 彻底改变药物发现药物发现很像拼图游戏。药物分子背后的化学成分必须被设计成与我们体内的蛋白质相匹配才能产生治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Revolutionizing-drug-discovery-with-SmartCADD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Revolutionizing-drug-discovery-with-SmartCADD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0350bc4a-649d-4ea8-86a0-86e9db02598a Tue, 08 Oct 2024 06:58:40 -0400 Revolutionizing drug discovery with SmartCADD
破译人类微生物组的奥秘Microsetta Initiative 研究人类微生物组，分析各种数据以揭示微生物、饮食和健康之间的联系，以改善公众健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Deciphering-the-Mysteries-of-the-Human-Microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Deciphering-the-Mysteries-of-the-Human-Microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b826adf6-45d8-4a85-b5cc-a3b7144f213e Tue, 08 Oct 2024 06:56:00 -0400 Deciphering the Mysteries of the Human Microbiome
即将到来的 ACA 开放注册期有哪些新内容以及需要注意的事项又到了一年中的这个时候：在大多数州，《平价医疗法案》的健康计划年度公开报名季从 11 月 1 日开始，一直持续到 1 月 15 日。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Whate28099s-new-and-what-to-watch-for-in-the-upcoming-ACA-open-enrollment-period.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Whate28099s-new-and-what-to-watch-for-in-the-upcoming-ACA-open-enrollment-period.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66ad62c9-6386-4858-9af2-8b7b8ea651a1 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 06:52:10 -0400 What’s new and what to watch for in the upcoming ACA open enrollment period
一名男孩骑自行车死亡的事件困扰着黑人社区。 35年后，仍然没有人行道。约翰·帕克 (John Parker) 上学前在达勒姆东部的奇克路 (Cheek Road) 上骑的自行车与一辆皮卡车相撞，导致约翰·帕克 (John Parker) 死亡，至今已有 35 年了。他当时 6 岁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/A-boye28099s-bicycling-death-haunts-a-Black-neighborhood-35-years-later-Theree28099s-still-no-sidewalk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/A-boye28099s-bicycling-death-haunts-a-Black-neighborhood-35-years-later-Theree28099s-still-no-sidewalk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4b19804-9621-45b2-9c25-f355f64c9cdf Tue, 08 Oct 2024 06:49:00 -0400 A boy’s bicycling death haunts a Black neighborhood. 35 years later, There’s still no sidewalk.
